title: Add search/filter functionality
description: Add a search bar to filter issues by title or description. Also add filter dropdowns for priority and type. Essential for boards with many issues.

title: Add paths for deeplinking to issues
notes: Deeplinking is already implemented using query params (?issue=ID). The current implementation updates URL when opening issues and handles back/forward navigation via popstate. Works with browser history. Path-based URLs would require SvelteKit route changes.
